backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product types and implementing CRUD, search, sorting, and stock toggling using a Map-based store.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing feature evidence for documentation requirements and associated components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend source files and components.
frontend/artifacts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to retain the empty artifacts directory in version control.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Documentation explaining how to package the PWA as a TWA and publish it to Google Play Store, including prerequisites and setup steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining global OKLCH color variables and dark mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file including PWA metadata, icons, manifest link, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest specifying app name, colors, start URL, icons, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/offline.html: Styled offline fallback page shown when the PWA cannot reach the network.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing network‑first caching with precaching, offline fallback, and cache cleanup.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-aab-release.s: Builds a signed release AAB for a Bubblewrap TWA project, prompting for keystore details and outputting the bundle for Play Store submission.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-debug.sh: Builds a debug APK from a TWA project and copies it to an artifacts directory for easy installation and testing.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-release.s: Generates a signed release APK for a Bubblewrap TWA project using a provided keystore, intended for distribution or testing.
frontend/scripts/twa-init.sh: Initializes a new Bubblewrap TWA project from a live web manifest, validating prerequisites and user inputs before generating project files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app's routing using TanStack Router and registers the service worker on load.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Dialog wrapper for creating or editing a product, embedding the AdminProductForm.
Product create/edit form handling validation, image upload, and submit logic using product mutations.
Admin table listing products with actions for edit, delete, and stock toggling, plus empty-state UI.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, category, price, and navigation to product details, including stock indicators and fallback images.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Handles PWA installation prompts, showing install UI when available and offering fallback instructions when the browser doesn't provide a prompt.
frontend/src/components/StoreFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, a promise statement, and a copyright line.
frontend/src/components/StoreHeader.tsx: Responsive store header with navigation links, authentication-aware admin link, PWA prompt, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/StoreLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and main routed content area.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Defines app slug and metadata used for deployment and branding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating product data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing products with login gating, product table, and create/edit dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home landing page showing hero content, features, and a grid of featured products.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed info for a single product with loading, error, and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Product listing page with search, sorting, and filtered grid of products.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker and logs registration status and update availability.
frontend/src/utils/imageToDataUrl.ts: Utility that converts an image File to a base64 Data URL using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/toUserMessage.ts: Utility that converts unknown errors into user‑friendly message strings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH color variables, extended theming, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for generating Android APKs, including schema info, feature requests, required PWA icons, and tasks for producing TWA-based debug builds.
